content: Chuck SFE 2-A12 offset ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for drill drivers and screwdrivers- - ### FEATURES:Features Combinable – you can attach any of the other chucks to the right-angle adapter for drilling and driving in spaces where the tool body would not reach otherwise Applications For use with the SFE 2-A12 multi-head installation drill driver ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: SFE 2-A12 Product information: Offset chuck – you can drive screws straight-on with only 10 mm clearance from an adjacent surface Technical Data | For use with | SFE 2-A12 | Product information | Offset chuck – you can drive screws straight-on with only 10 mm clearance from an adjacent surface ### ITEMS- 2241377 - Chuck SFE 2-A12 offset - Package Size 1 pc
